summary: Sarah Bolger  is an Irish actress who stars primarily in movies.
full_text: Sarah Lee Bolger  is an Irish actress. She is best known for her roles in the films In America, Stormbreaker, and The Spiderwick Chronicles, as well as her award winning role as Lady Mary Tudor in the TV series The Tudors, and for guest starring as Princess Aurora in Once Upon a Time.
title: Sarah Bolger
